channel.title: FED UP with my annoying comp
channel.description: my computer has been giving me problems for a while now it keeps on crashing. sometimes it just reboots automatically with me having no control over it. all my applications keep crashing and coming up with an error report programs such as: firefox, nod32, azureus, limwire, system mechanic7, java and tons more. sometimes they shut down automaically. and sometimes it comes up with an error report asking if i should send it to microsoft or not. sometimes after booting it says your system has recovered from a serious error... this it what the log contains: [URL=http://img293.imageshack.us/my.php?image=seriouserroryr5.png][IMG]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/5213/seriouserroryr5.th.png[/img][/URL] this is what the firefox error contains: [URL=http://img224.imageshack.us/my.php?image=newbitmapimagewm6.png][IMG]http://img224.imageshack.us/img224/7889/newbitmapimagewm6.th.png[/img][/URL] btw i scanned my comp with nod32 it found no viruses
